jobDescription: Perform Bio-Analytical testing such as Flow Cytometry, ELISA, cell count, cell viability, residual bead assessment, qPCR, Potency. * Perform all testing and activities compliantly following appropriate SOPs and procedures. * Maintain controls and reference standards to support method development.. * Review/approve data generated by other team members. * Train others. * Execute method qualification/optimization of methods. * Participate in deviation investigation/CAPA implementation in a timely manner. * Continually identify areas for improvements in project work. * Knowledge of appropriate GMP/GLP quality systems (eSOPs, TEDI, etc). * Support tracking and trending systems, and programs which assist in the testing, evaluation and monitoring of quality and efficiency. * Review Bioanalytics documents to ensure completeness, accuracy, consistency and clarity. * Revise SOPs, forms, laboratory data sheets (LDS). * Generate Cell Lines Performs other job duties as assigned.Minimum RequirementsBA or MS in biology, chemistry, biochemistry, microbiology or other related science. Fluent in English 3-8 years of experience in the pharmaceutical, biologics, microbiology Knowledge of cGMP and GLP Thorough knowledge of bioassay test methods, as appropriate. Ability to communicate clearly with a variety of individuals in various aspects of Novartis operations. Detail-oriented with expertise in problem solving and solid decision making abilities. Strong written and verbal communication skills are essential.
